name: Initials and Acronyms Quiz | General | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is MARC a standard for?
questions.explanation:
Cataloguing.

	Machine Readable Cataloguing - variations known as UKMARC, USMARC, etc

Brain disease.

	Creuzfeld-Jacob Disease is a degenerative brain disease

questions.text: Where can you be elected a TD?
questions.explanation:
Ireland.

	The Dail (pronounced Doil) is Ireland's parliament

questions.text: Of what sport is FINA the international governing body?
questions.explanation:
Swimming.

	Federation Internationale de Natation Amateur

questions.text: Everyone knows the initials BBC, but what exactly do they stand for?
questions.explanation:
British Broadcasting Corporation.

	Nicknamed Birtish Broadcasting Corporation under its last Director General, John Birt

questions.text: What are KBE, KCMG, and KCVO?
questions.explanation:
Knights of the Realm.

	Knight of the British Empire, Knight Commander of the Order of St Michael and St George, Knight Commander of the Royal Victorian Order

questions.text: Of which country is LOT the airline?
Where would you be flying to if your baggage tag says LHR?
What were CS Lewis' first names?
questions.explanation:
Clive Staples.

	Author of the Narnia series of children's books and several Christian apologetics and allegories.

questions.text: What does pp on a music score mean?
questions.explanation:
Very quiet.

	Pianissimo (pp) is very quiet, fortissimo (ff) is very loud.
